short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Short Life is a quirky yet challenging physics-based platformer where survival is key!
short.bg: Short Life е странен, но предизвикателен базиран на физика платформинг, където оцеляването е от ключово значение!
short.ca: Short Life és un joc de plataformes basat en la física estrany però desafiant on la supervivència és clau!
short.cs: Krátký život je svérázná, ale náročná plošinovka založená na fyzice, kde je přežití klíčové!
short.da: Short Life er en finurlig, men udfordrende fysikbaseret platformspil, hvor overlevelse er nøglen!
short.de: Short Life ist ein skurriler, aber herausfordernder, auf Physik basierender Plattformer, bei dem es aufs Überleben ankommt!
short.el: Το Short Life είναι ένα ιδιόρρυθμο αλλά προκλητικό εξόδου που βασίζεται στη φυσική, όπου η επιβίωση είναι το κλειδί!
short.es: Short Life es un juego de plataformas basado en la física peculiar pero desafiante donde la supervivencia es clave.
short.et: Short Life on omapärane, kuid väljakutseid pakkuv füüsikapõhine platformer, kus ellujäämine on võtmetähtsusega!
short.fi: Short Life on omituinen mutta haastava fysiikkapohjainen tasopeli, jossa selviytyminen on avainasemassa!
short.fil: Ang Short Life ay isang kakaiba ngunit mapaghamong physics-based na platformer kung saan ang kaligtasan ay susi!
short.fr: Short Life est un jeu de plateforme basé sur la physique à la fois original et stimulant, où la survie est la clé !
short.he: Short Life הוא פלטפורמה מוזרה אך מאתגרת מבוססת פיזיקה שבה הישרדות היא המפתח!
short.hi: शॉर्ट लाइफ एक विचित्र लेकिन चुनौतीपूर्ण भौतिकी-आधारित प्लेटफ़ॉर्मर है जहाँ जीवित रहना महत्वपूर्ण है!
short.hr: Short Life je neobičan, ali izazovan platformer temeljen na fizici u kojem je preživljavanje ključno!
short.hu: A Short Life egy mókás, de kihívásokkal teli, fizikaalapú platformjáték, ahol a túlélés a kulcs!
short.id: Short Life adalah platformer berbasis fisika yang unik namun menantang di mana kelangsungan hidup adalah kuncinya!
short.it: Short Life è un gioco platform bizzarro ma impegnativo basato sulla fisica in cui la sopravvivenza è fondamentale!
short.ja: Short Life は、生き残ることが鍵となる、風変わりだがやりがいのある物理ベースのプラットフォーマーです。
short.ko: Short Life는 생존이 핵심인 기발하면서도 도전적인 물리 기반 플랫폼 게임입니다!
short.lt: „Short Life“ yra nepakartojamas, tačiau sudėtingas fizikos pagrindu sukurtas platformingas žaidimas, kuriame išlikimas yra labai…
short.lv: Short Life ir savdabīga, taču izaicinoša uz fiziku balstīta platformas spēle, kurā izdzīvošana ir galvenais!
short.ms: Short Life ialah platformer berasaskan fizik yang unik namun mencabar di mana kelangsungan hidup adalah kunci!
short.nl: Short Life is een eigenzinnige maar uitdagende, op fysica gebaseerde platformgame waarin overleven centraal staat!
short.no: Short Life er et sært, men utfordrende fysikkbasert plattformspill der overlevelse er nøkkelen!
short.pl: Short Life to dziwaczna, ale wymagająca platformówka oparta na fizyce, w której kluczem jest przetrwanie!
short.ro: Short Life este un joc de platforme bazat pe fizică, ciudat, dar provocator, în care supraviețuirea este cheia!
short.ru: Short Life — необычный, но сложный платформер, основанный на физике, где выживание является ключевым моментом!
short.sk: Short Life je svojrázna, no zároveň náročná fyzikálna plošinovka, kde je prežitie kľúčové!
short.sl: Short Life je nenavadna, a zahtevna platformna igra, ki temelji na fiziki, kjer je preživetje ključno!
short.sr: Схорт Лифе је необичан, али изазован платформер заснован на физици где је преживљавање кључно!
short.sv: Short Life är ett udda men ändå utmanande fysikbaserat plattformsspel där överlevnad är nyckeln!
short.th: Short Life เป็นเกมแพลตฟอร์มฟิสิกส์ที่แปลกแต่ท้าทาย โดยที่การเอาชีวิตรอดเป็นกุญแจสำคัญ!
short.tr: Short Life, hayatta kalmanın önemli olduğu ilginç ama zorlu fizik tabanlı bir platform oyunudur!
short.uk: Short Life — це химерний, але складний платформер на основі фізики, де виживання є ключовим!
short.vi: Short Life là một game nền tảng dựa trên vật lý kỳ quặc nhưng đầy thách thức, trong đó sự sống còn là chìa khóa!
short.zh_CN: 《Short Life》是一款古怪但具有挑战性的基于物理的平台游戏，生存是关键！
short.zh_TW: 《Short Life》是一款古怪又具有挑戰性的基於實體的平台遊戲，生存是關鍵！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get ready for a hilariously dangerous adventure! With the Short Life Chrome extension, you can dive straight into the game from your browser. Navigate through deadly levels, avoid brutal traps, and try to survive without losing too many limbs. Whether you want a quick break or an extended play session, Short Life is now just a click away!

Why Install the Extension?

🎮 Quick Access: Launch the game directly from your Chrome toolbar for instant fun.
🕹️ No Setup Required: No need for downloads or installations—play in your browser instantly.
💀 Physics-Based Fun: Experience ragdoll mechanics and funny, unexpected deaths anytime!
🌐 Offline Mode: Play without an internet connection—perfect for long commutes or downtime.
🏆 Share and Compete: Show off your progress and compete with friends to see who can survive the longest!
Features:

🛡️ Dodge deadly traps and make it to the finish line intact.
🎯 Collect stars and unlock new characters along the way.
🦵 Enjoy hilarious ragdoll physics and unpredictable gameplay.
⏱️ Replay levels to improve your score and perfect your survival skills.
🏅 Compete with friends and share your best runs with ease.
How to Use:

Install the extension from the Chrome Web Store.
Click the game icon in your browser to start playing.
Survive and collect stars across levels filled with crazy obstacles.
Challenge yourself to complete levels without losing any body parts!
Ready to test your survival skills? Install the Short Life Chrome extension now and see if you can make it through every level without losing your head—literally! 🤣
